title: Pera Schnellrestaurant
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Pizza, Fast food, Take-out, Middle Eastern, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Restaurant with a vegan friendly menu, offering almost 20 choices including a falafel pocket, Turkish pizza (no vegan cheese), appetizers and pasta dishes. Nearly all meatless foods are vegan. Specialty is the vegan doner kebab. Try the vegan iskender kebab (vegan doner with roasted bread, soy yogurt and tomato sauce). More vegan choices: stuffed bell peppers or eggplant, wraps and breads with kisir or falafel, noodles with vegetables, salad, bread with dips. Also offers fries and other fast foods. Food is freshly made-in-house by the owner himself.
